martin.benuska wrote:
>
> Hello,
>
> is there a way how to automatically repair broken links in downloaded
> file. Especially in situation, where we download only text
> files(html,js), all the links are usualy broken. Howto to deal with this ?
>








I do not know of such a tool.  Would be a nice tool to have though.  For 
example, it could be used to make the DVD of archived content that a 
poster from a few days ago asked for.

St.Ack
